metadata.title: CVE-2024-10941 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A malicious website could have included an iframe with an malformed URIresulting in a non-exploitable browser crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 126.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
